mapper.insert: insert into lg_carrier (carrierId, carrierName, enterpriseNature, enterprisePhone, enterpriseAddress, registeredCapital, corporateRepresentative, businessLicenseNumber, taxRegistrationNumber, roadTransportLicense, advantageLine, cooperationState, affiliatedCompany, cardPicture, businessLicensePictures, roadTransportLicensePicture, contractPicture, remarks1, remarks2 ) values (#{carrierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carriername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterprisenature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterprisephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businesslicensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxregistrationnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadtransportlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advantageline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cooperationstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{affiliatedcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businesslicensepictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadtransportlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update lg_carrier set carrierName = #{carriername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterpriseNature = #{enterprisenature,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enterprisePhone = #{enterprisephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterpriseAddress = #{enterpriseaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registeredCapital = #{registeredcapital,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, corporateRepresentative = #{corporaterepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessLicenseNumber = #{businesslicensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxRegistrationNumber = #{taxregistrationnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roadTransportLicense = #{roadtransportlicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advantageLine = #{advantageline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cooperationState = #{cooperationstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, affiliatedCompany = #{affiliatedcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardPicture = #{cardpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessLicensePictures = #{businesslicensepictures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roadTransportLicensePicture = #{roadtransportlicensepicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractPicture = #{contractpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where carrierId = #{carrierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select carrierId, carrierName, enterpriseNature, enterprisePhone, enterpriseAddress, registeredCapital, corporateRepresentative, businessLicenseNumber, taxRegistrationNumber, roadTransportLicense, advantageLine, cooperationState, affiliatedCompany, cardPicture, businessLicensePictures, roadTransportLicensePicture, contractPicture, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_carrier where carrierId = #{carrierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
